translation.en: [male voice whispers] Good luck, baby Willa.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 薇拉宝贝 （薇柳沃德所属）

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -[wind blows]
translation.zh: （躲藏魔药）

translation.en: [man] Chili-chili-chila! Willi-willi-Willa!
translation.zh: 墨西哥辣肉酱 薇拉就想要这样

translation.en: Birthday chili brewed to perfection! [man mimics echo] Ection, ection…
translation.zh: 精心烹制的极品生日辣肉酱

translation.en: I'm so proud my birthday girl
translation.zh: 我太自豪了 我的寿星女儿

translation.en: ordered her dad's special chili for her birthday dinner.
translation.zh: 生日点名要吃爸爸的招牌辣肉酱

translation.en: -Wouldn't be my birthday without it. -Oh.
translation.zh: 不吃辣肉酱就不叫过生日

translation.en: Now, I know you wanted a phone, but I think…
translation.zh: 对了 我知道你想要手机 但我觉得

translation.en: you're going to like this even more.
translation.zh: 你会更喜欢这个

translation.en: Come on, open it!
translation.zh: 快呀 打开看看

translation.en: Whoa. "Property of Willow Ward."
translation.zh: “薇柳沃德所属”

translation.en: -[soft music plays] -[dad] It was your mom's.
translation.zh: 这是你妈妈的

translation.en: She wanted you to have it when you were old enough to know what to do with it.
translation.zh: 她让我在你能用上它时把它交给你

translation.en: [inhales] Now I'm no fashion expert, but I figured 12 years old,
translation.zh: 我不是时尚专家 但你都12岁了

translation.en: you're old enough to know how to wear a necklace.
translation.zh: 应该懂得该如何戴项链了

translation.en: She used to pull my leg and tell me it was magic.
translation.zh: 她以前会跟我开玩笑说 这是一条魔法项链

translation.en: Your mom would always say,
translation.zh: 你妈妈总是说：

translation.en: "Believe in magic and life will be magical."
translation.zh: “只要你相信魔法 人生就会变得奇妙”

translation.en: -Can you help me put it on? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你能帮我戴上吗？ 好

translation.en: [takes deep breath] So, how do I look?
translation.zh: 怎么样？好看吗？

translation.en: As beautiful as your mom,
translation.zh: 就像你妈妈一样美丽

translation.en: and she was the most beautiful woman in the world.
translation.zh: 她是世上最美的女人

translation.en: Thank you for trusting me with this, Dad. I'll wear it forever.
translation.zh: 谢谢你信任我 爸爸 我会永远戴着它的

translation.en: Happy birthday, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 生日快乐 亲爱的

translation.en: Chili.
translation.zh: 辣肉酱

translation.en: Chili. [laughs]
translation.zh: 辣肉酱

translation.en: [dad] Okay, birthday girl,
translation.zh: 好了 小寿星 你可要准备好了

translation.en: you better put on a jacket because this stuff is chili.
translation.zh: 好了 小寿星 你可要准备好了 我煮了“辣”么多哦

translation.en: It couldn't be. After all this time.
translation.zh: 不会吧 时隔了这么久

translation.en: Looks like they didn't leave it with great-uncle William.
translation.zh: 看来这也没有留给曾叔父威廉

translation.en: Scratch another loser off the list.
translation.zh: 从名单上再划掉一个没用的

translation.en: Twelve years of searching and another dead end.
translation.zh: 找了12年 又扑了一个空

translation.en: We'll never find it in time.
translation.zh: 我们不可能及时找到了！

translation.en: I don't know, Wilma.
translation.zh: 话别这么说 威尔玛

translation.en: Maybe if you chipped in and did a little digging, we might just find it, okay?
translation.zh: 要是你搭把手帮着挖 说不定我们能找到呢 好吗？

translation.en: Oh yeah. Huh, that's a huge help.
translation.zh: 哦 你这可真是帮了大忙

translation.en: Oh. Wait, wait, wait.
translation.zh: 等等！

translation.en: Was that…?
translation.zh: 那是…

translation.en: Could it be?
translation.zh: 难道说？

translation.en: I think it was.
translation.zh: 我觉得是的

translation.en: -[crow] It is! It's back in Winding Way. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 是的！它回到蜿蜒路镇了！

translation.en: I nearly blew off my perch. The amulet has resurfaced and you'll never guess where.
translation.zh: 我震惊得差点摔下来 护身符又出现了 你绝对猜不到它在哪儿

translation.en: Does this mean we can stop digging?
translation.zh: 这意味着我们可以不再挖了吗？

translation.en: Don't count your eyeballs before they blink, Sneak,
translation.zh: 你先别高兴得太早 斯匿克

translation.en: but, as they say, maybe.
translation.zh: 不过就像它说的 是有可能的哦

translation.en: You found the amulet?
translation.zh: 你找到护身符了？

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing? Stop.
translation.zh: 喂 你们在干什么？住手！

translation.en: Uh-oh. Let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -So long, mortal.
translation.zh: 再见了 凡人

translation.en: I still can't believe it was under our noses this whole time.
translation.zh: 我还是不敢相信 它一直就在我们眼皮底下

translation.en: Right there.
translation.zh: 就在那里

translation.en: Like, right there, in Willow's very house.
translation.zh: 就在薇柳的家里面

translation.en: -Bright side… -Hm?
translation.zh: 往好的一面想 至少我们找到了

translation.en: -At least we found it. -Oh, is that the bright side?
translation.zh: 往好的一面想 至少我们找到了 那是好的一面吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Is it? Because we wasted, I don't know,
translation.zh: 我们可是浪费了 我想想

translation.en: over ten years of our lives looking for it, so…
translation.zh: 十几年的生命去找它啊

translation.en: [inhales] It's fine.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: Sticky-Paws Fink,
translation.zh: 黏爪子芬克

translation.en: tomorrow you do what you do best.
translation.zh: 明天你要拿出你的绝招

translation.en: Whatever you need, boss. Fink will not let you down.
translation.zh: 听你的吩咐 老大 芬克不会让你失望的

translation.en: And finally…
translation.zh: 终于啊

translation.en: the amulet will be ours.
translation.zh: 护身符会是我们的

translation.en: Alright, let's go in.
translation.zh: 好了 我们进去吧

translation.en: [caws] I guess I'll just stay out here.
translation.zh: 那我就待在这里吧

translation.en: -Oh, hey, let's get this party started. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 嘿 我们开始派对吧！

translation.en: Sorry I'm late,
translation.zh: 对不起 我迟到了

translation.en: but coordinating for a slumber party requires a lot of planning.
translation.zh: 协调睡衣派对需要很多计划安排

translation.en: Scout, you're not late. You're 30 seconds early.
translation.zh: 丝考特 你没迟到 你早来了30秒

translation.en: Whew. You know I detest lateness.
translation.zh: 你知道我很讨厌迟到的

translation.en: -[laughs] -Oh.
translation.zh: 薇拉！

translation.en: Lucy!
translation.zh: 露西！

translation.en: Let the Willa Ward birthday bonanza begin!
translation.zh: 让我们开始薇拉沃德的生日狂欢吧！

translation.en: -[laughs] -I couldn't find my bike anywhere. -I had to use my little brother's. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 我到处都找不到我的自行车 所以只好用我弟弟的

translation.en: Look Mr. Ward, can we cut to the chase?
translation.zh: 沃德叔叔 我们直接进入正题吧？

translation.en: Everyone knows in your line of business, your loot bags are the best.
translation.zh: 大家都知道干你这行的 最会准备派对礼包了

translation.en: It'd be amazing if we could break tradition
translation.zh: 如果我们能打破传统

translation.en: and get into them a little early.
translation.zh: 早点拿到它就太好了

translation.en: Oh Scout, you know flattery gets me every time.
translation.zh: 哦 丝考特 你知道我最吃拍马屁这一套了

translation.en: Hey, I didn't get into the candy business for nothing, huh?
translation.zh: 喂 我的糖果店可不是白开的

translation.en: -Let's go get some loot! Ha ha! -[cheering]
translation.zh: 我们去拿派对礼包吧！ -太棒了！ -快过来！

translation.en: -Dad, I think they know. -Come on, Willa.
translation.zh: -爸爸 大家知道我过生日啦 -不 我就要举着

translation.en: -Ugh, fine. [groans] -Don't wanna waste it.
translation.zh: -好吧 -我可不想浪费

translation.en: This is the best candy ever.
translation.zh: 这是史上最棒的糖果

translation.en: Your dad slays it with the loot bags.
translation.zh: 你爸爸的派对礼包真是绝了

translation.en: Hey, girls. You sure you want to sleep up in the attic tonight?
translation.zh: 姑娘们 你们确定今晚要睡阁楼吗？

translation.en: Yeah, Dad. It's way more fun to tell ghost stories up here.
translation.zh: 确定 爸爸 在这里讲鬼故事要有趣得多

translation.en: Okay. Well nothing too spooky, okay? And lights out by midnight.
translation.zh: 好吧 你们别弄得太吓人了 好吗？ 午夜前熄灯

translation.en: Love you.
translation.zh: 爱你

translation.en: Love you, Dad.
translation.zh: 爱你 爸爸

translation.en: Ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: It was hers.
translation.zh: 这是她的项链

translation.en: My dad wanted to wait until I was old enough so I could take good care of it.
translation.zh: 我爸爸说我能好好保管它了 所以交给了我

translation.en: [Scout] Your mom had amazing taste.
translation.zh: 你妈妈的品味真好

translation.en: -That is so vintage. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 这款式太经典了

translation.en: You never really talk about her.
translation.zh: 你从来没怎么说过你妈妈的事

translation.en: I don't know much about her.
translation.zh: 我不太了解她

translation.en: I would like to know more, but…
translation.zh: 我想知道更多 但我怕我爸爸伤心

translation.en: I'm worried it makes Dad sad if I'm always asking questions.
translation.zh: 我想知道更多 但我怕我爸爸伤心 如果我一直不停问问题的话

translation.en: Besides, it feels like she's right here with us anyway.
translation.zh: 再说了 我感觉她现在就在我们身边呢

translation.en: What's taking him so long?
translation.zh: 它怎么还不来？

translation.en: Never send a rat to do a cat's job.
translation.zh: 千万不要让老鼠去做猫的工作

translation.en: He's probably messing up as we speak.
translation.zh: 没准它现在正在捅娄子呢

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 给点力吧

translation.en: Since Halloween is coming, this one is all about
translation.zh: 既然万圣节要来了 那我来讲讲蜿蜒路镇三女巫的传说

translation.en: [in a spooky voice] the legend of the Three Witches of Winding Way.
translation.zh: 那我来讲讲蜿蜒路镇三女巫的传说

translation.en: You know that legend is totally made up, right?
translation.zh: 你知道那个传说是假的吧？

translation.en: [in a ghostly voice] Who says?
translation.zh: 谁说的？

translation.en: What was that?
translation.zh: 什么动静？

translation.en: [Lucy] What was that?
translation.zh: 什么动静？

translation.en: Oh, you were so not supposed to see me.
translation.zh: 你们根本不该看见我的

translation.en: What? Did you just… talk?
translation.zh: 什么？ 你刚才说话了吗？

translation.en: Oops.
translation.zh: 糟糕

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt. [chuckles] Pay no attention.
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰了 你们别管我 该干什么干什么去吧

translation.en: You, you go back to what you were… doing.
translation.zh: 你们别管我 该干什么干什么去吧

translation.en: What's with all the screaming? You're scaring me.
translation.zh: 叫什么叫？你们吓到我了

translation.en: Wait. He has my necklace!
translation.zh: 等等 它拿了我的项链

translation.en: Eek! Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Where did it go?
translation.zh: 它去哪儿了？

translation.en: -Ew. -[Fink] Just forget I was ever here.
translation.zh: 就忘了我来过这里吧

translation.en: Why is it talking?
translation.zh: 它为什么会说话？

translation.en: [whimpers] I am so not touching that thing.
translation.zh: 我才不要碰那个家伙呢！

translation.en: No touching. Just…
translation.zh: 不碰也行 只要

translation.en: Get my necklace back.
translation.zh: 把我的项链拿回来就行

translation.en: We have to find it.
translation.zh: 我们必须找到它！

translation.en: Bless you.
translation.zh: 保佑你

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -[Scout gasps] Found him! -[yelps]
translation.zh: -找到它了！ -快围住它！

translation.en: -Corner him! -Ha! Trapped like a rat.
translation.zh: 你这个过街老鼠

translation.en: That is my mom's necklace.
translation.zh: 那是我妈妈的项链

translation.en: -[Willa] Drop it. -[fizzling]
translation.zh: 放下

translation.en: -Oh, no. Uh-oh. That's not right. -[mystical music plays]
translation.zh: 哦 糟糕 这不对啊 项链已经掉下来了！

translation.en: I dropped it already. I dropped it.
translation.zh: 这不对啊 项链已经掉下来了！

translation.en: What is happening?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Willa!
translation.zh: 薇拉！

translation.en: Stop, broom.
translation.zh: 扫帚快停下！

translation.en: [yells] Stop!
translation.zh: 停下！

translation.en: What was that?
translation.zh: 刚才是怎么回事？

translation.en: I have no idea.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Terrifying is what it was.
translation.zh: 真是太可怕了

translation.en: [groaning] Look out!
translation.zh: 小心！

translation.en: I gotta get out of here.
translation.zh: 我得走了

translation.en: -[laughs] See ya later, kids. -No!
translation.zh: 回头见 孩子们 不！

translation.en: -[grunting] -Gotcha.
translation.zh: 抓到你了！

translation.en: Nothing? How about this? [growls]
translation.zh: 怎么？你们不怕吗？这样呢？

translation.en: Nope, nope, nope.
translation.zh: 不要啊 不！

translation.en: -Come on, let me out! -Let's hide.
translation.zh: -放我出去！ -我们躲起来

translation.en: You give me back my necklace, I'll give you back your freedom.
translation.zh: 你把项链还我 我就还你自由

translation.en: Uh, look, I wish I could, but it's a long story. Trust me.
translation.zh: 听着 我倒是想还给你 可是 这事说来话长 相信我

translation.en: Then you'll have to stay in this jar forever,
translation.zh: 那你就得永远待在这个罐子里

translation.en: and soon, you'll get really hungry.
translation.zh: 很快你就会饿坏了

translation.en: -[Willa] So, do we have a deal? -[groaning] Oh, alright, you got a deal.
translation.zh: 你要和我交易吗？ 好吧 成交

translation.en: -Who are you anyway? -[mumbles through sealed lips]
translation.zh: 你到底是谁？

translation.en: Fine. Don't tell me.
translation.zh: 好吧 不说也行

translation.en: But you're lucky I love animals,
translation.zh: 算你走运 我是个关爱动物的人

translation.en: or tonight wouldn't have ended so well for you.
translation.zh: 否则今晚你不会落得好下场

translation.en: Oh, Willa. [chuckles] You're just like your mom. Heart of gold.
translation.zh: 薇拉 你就像你妈妈一样纯美善良

translation.en: Wait, did you just say I'm just like… my mom?
translation.zh: 等等 你刚才说我跟我妈妈一样吗？

translation.en: Fink, what's taking so long?
translation.zh: 芬克 你怎么去了这么久？

translation.en: Gotta go, Willa. Uh, I mean, uh, whoever you are. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我得走了 薇拉！ 不对 我并不认识你啦

translation.en: What do you know about my mom? And how do you know my name?
translation.zh: 你对我妈妈了解多少？ 你又是怎么知道我的名字的？

translation.en: Is it safe?
translation.zh: 安全了吗？

translation.en: Where did my mom get this?
translation.zh: 我妈妈是从哪里弄来的这个呢？

translation.en: Where is he?
translation.zh: 它在哪里？

translation.en: -I'm here, I'm here, I'm here. -[screaming]
translation.zh: 我回来了！

translation.en: Finally! [groans]
translation.zh: 你总算回来了！

translation.en: First, the good news: we've definitely found the necklace.
translation.zh: 先说个好消息 项链我们肯定是找到了

translation.en: -Amazing work, Fink. -Great work.
translation.zh: -做得好 芬克！ -干得好！

translation.en: The moldiest cheese for your dinner tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚你能吃到发霉发得最厉害的奶酪

translation.en: I was starting to think we couldn't count on you, but you proved me wrong.
translation.zh: 我本来都觉得指望不上你了 结果你用行动证明了自己！

translation.en: You sure did, you little rat-Fink,
translation.zh: 没错 你这个可恶的小老鼠

translation.en: stinky-eyed, poop-breath, nonsensical, cat-fish whispering nightmare of a rat!
translation.zh: 贼眉鼠眼、满口屎臭、没头没脑 只会逗猫和鱼玩儿的噩梦般的老鼠

translation.en: Hand it over.
translation.zh: 把它交出来

translation.en: Uh, you might want to save the compliments for after the bad news,
translation.zh: 你先别急着夸我 我还没说坏消息呢

translation.en: w-w-which is, um… [clears throat]
translation.zh: 那就是

translation.en: She has it.
translation.zh: 项链还在她那儿

translation.en: Okay, you know all those compliments I just gave you? I take them all back.
translation.zh: 好吧 我刚才的那串赞美连珠炮 我全都收回来！

translation.en: She?
translation.zh: 她？

translation.en: -No. -You don't mean--
translation.zh: -不 -你该不会是说…

translation.en: Yep. Willa Ward has the necklace.
translation.zh: 没错 项链在薇拉沃德手里

translation.en: [exhales] I just had the craziest dream.
translation.zh: 我刚做了一个超疯狂的梦

translation.en: I don't think it was a dream.
translation.zh: 我不觉得刚才是梦

translation.en: You mean, you actually rode a broomstick?
translation.zh: 你是说你真的骑了扫帚？

translation.en: And there's actually a talking rat?
translation.zh: 还有一个会说话的老鼠？

translation.en: Are we actually losing our minds?
translation.zh: 我们真的是疯了吗？

translation.en: [mimicking TV presenter] Today, schoolgirls fly on brooms,
translation.zh: 今天的节目中 女学童骑着扫帚飞翔

translation.en: and confide in talking, jewelry-stealing rats
translation.zh: 还向一只偷珠宝的会说话的老鼠倾诉

translation.en: on a very special episode of
translation.zh: 欢迎收看特别节目

translation.en: Adventures of a Middle Schooler Gone Mad.
translation.zh: 《疯魔中学生的冒险》

translation.en: Definitely not your everyday necklace.
translation.zh: 这绝对不是一般的项链

translation.en: What isn't your dad telling you?
translation.zh: 你爸爸有什么事瞒着你？

translation.en: Let's go find out. [exhales]
translation.zh: 我们去探个究竟

translation.en: [raps] ♪ P-P-Porridge Porridge Willa-Worridge ♪
translation.zh: 粥好啦！薇拉来喝粥！

translation.en: ♪ Come and get your special oatmeal ♪
translation.zh: 快来吃你的特制麦片粥

translation.en: Dad, you'll never believe what happened last night.
translation.zh: 爸爸 昨晚发生了特别离奇的事

translation.en: I woke up and a talking rat had my necklace.
translation.zh: 我醒来发现 一只会说话的老鼠偷了我的项链

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -Did you hear her say talking rat?
translation.zh: 你听到她说“会说话的老鼠”了吗？

translation.en: We were chasing it with brooms, and out of the blue,
translation.zh: 我们用扫帚追赶它 然后突然扫帚开始四处乱飞！

translation.en: the brooms started flying everywhere.
translation.zh: 然后突然扫帚开始四处乱飞！

translation.en: No way!
translation.zh: 不是吧！

translation.en: Flying brooms and talking rats. What a night. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 会飞的扫帚和会说话的老鼠 真是个奇妙的夜晚！

translation.en: Yeah. Willa flew right out the window.
translation.zh: 对 薇拉直接从窗户飞出去了

translation.en: And the rat said I look like Mom.
translation.zh: 老鼠还说我长得像妈妈

translation.en: Well, they're not wrong there. Beautiful inside and out.
translation.zh: 那倒是没错 内在外在都很美

translation.en: You know, maybe I should speak with this talking rat that knew your mom.
translation.zh: 也许我应该跟这只 认识你妈妈的会说话的老鼠聊聊

translation.en: We could swap stories.
translation.zh: 我们可以聊聊她的故事

translation.en: Isn't that crazy?
translation.zh: 你不觉得这很疯狂吗？

translation.en: Crazy, man!
translation.zh: 太疯狂了！

translation.en: You don't believe us, do you?
translation.zh: 你不相信我们 对吧？

translation.en: I believe that too much candy and spooky stories make for wacky dreams.
translation.zh: 我认为吃太多糖果和听恐怖故事 会让人做荒唐的梦

translation.en: I ate five chocolate bars before bed once, and I woke up
translation.zh: 有一次我睡前吃了五根巧克力棒 醒来后 我坚信我骑着河马飞越月球

translation.en: convinced that I rode a hippopotamus across the moon
translation.zh: 醒来后 我坚信我骑着河马飞越月球

translation.en: to meet the marshmallow queen
translation.zh: 去见棉花糖女王

translation.en: so we could eat a rocket ship made out of Jell-O
translation.zh: 和她吃果冻做成的火箭船

translation.en: and then play tic-tac-toe.
translation.zh: 然后玩井字游戏

translation.en: -Dad. -[dad] Yeah?
translation.zh: -爸爸 -嗯？

translation.en: This really happened.
translation.zh: 这真的发生了

translation.en: Hey, could you guys get me one of those flying brooms?
translation.zh: 你们能给我一把飞天扫帚吗？

translation.en: Could help me clean up the shop better. Alright. Dig in.
translation.zh: 可以帮我清理店铺 好了 吃饭吧

translation.en: -[sighing] -[dad] Speaking of cleaning up…
translation.zh: 说到清理

translation.en: -[suspenseful music plays] -Nothing like my necklace anywhere. Hm.
translation.zh: 我找不到和我的类似的项链

translation.en: Should we try that weird bookstore with all the crystals and stuff?
translation.zh: 我们要不要去那家 有各种水晶的奇怪书店？

translation.en: -Good idea. -[phone chimes]
translation.zh: 好主意

translation.en: -Oh shoot. I'm late. -[Lucy] To be continued?
translation.zh: 糟了 我要迟到了！ 下次继续？

translation.en: We'll get to the bottom of it. Until then, just don't touch any brooms?
translation.zh: 我们会查清楚的 在那之前 别碰任何扫帚？

translation.en: -Bye. -[Scout] Bye.
translation.zh: -再见 -再见

translation.en: We only have one month left till Halloween.
translation.zh: 离万圣节只有一个月了

translation.en: Oh, what are you doing reading that book?
translation.zh: 你看那本书做什么？

translation.en: I had a brainwave. What if we had a summon-the-necklace spell?
translation.zh: 我有个主意 万一我们有召唤项链的魔咒呢？

translation.en: Uh, we probably would have used it already if we did.
translation.zh: 要是有的话 我们早就用了吧

translation.en: I'm just thinking out loud.
translation.zh: 我是在自言自语啦

translation.en: Still gonna look.
translation.zh: 我还是要查查看

translation.en: Okay, will everyone please just stop talking
translation.zh: 好了 我求你们了！ 嘴巴消停一下 让我冷静思考行吗？

translation.en: [high-pitched] for one minute so I can hear myself think?
translation.zh: 嘴巴消停一下 让我冷静思考行吗？

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: [regular voice] I need to concentrate. We need a plan.
translation.zh: 我需要集中精神 我们需要一个计划

translation.en: I suggest a potion to turn the girl into a baby bunny.
translation.zh: 我建议用魔药把那女孩变成小兔宝宝

translation.en: Stupid.
translation.zh: -真聪明 -真愚蠢

translation.en: Then Claw could go catch her and bring her up here.
translation.zh: 克劳可以去抓她 把她带到这里来

translation.en: First we mix the fingernails of a rabid mountain squirrel with the--
translation.zh: 首先把一只发狂的山松鼠的指甲混…

translation.en: Why don't we just invite her for tea? Who doesn't like tea?
translation.zh: 不如我们邀请她来喝茶吧？ 谁不喜欢喝茶呢？

translation.en: -[blows raspberry] -Um, 12-year-old girls.
translation.zh: 她是个12岁的女孩

translation.en: You might want to try a soda, a juice box, mocha frappuccino…
translation.zh: 你应该试试汽水、果汁、摩卡星冰乐

translation.en: [Fink] I mean, hello!
translation.zh: 你懂不懂啊？

translation.en: How should I know? I detest children. They make me break out in hives.
translation.zh: 我怎么知道？我讨厌孩子 他们让我浑身起荨麻疹

translation.en: Yeah, right? It's like… [shudders]
translation.zh: 就是啊 恶心死了

translation.en: Alright, let's go with the dumb tea party idea.
translation.zh: 好吧 就办个愚蠢的茶会吧

translation.en: -Yay. [gasps] What should we wear? -[meows, hisses]
translation.zh: 我们穿什么好呢？

translation.en: I don't know. Something gross?
translation.zh: 我不知道 穿点恶心的？

translation.en: Cat amulets… No…
translation.zh: 猫护身符 没有

translation.en: [sighing] Nothing.
translation.zh: 这里没有

translation.en: Maybe in here.
translation.zh: 也许这里会有

translation.en: [sighing] Zilch.
translation.zh: 还是没有

translation.en: -Mom? -[soft music plays]
translation.zh: 妈妈？

translation.en: This is a real mystery. [sighs]
translation.zh: 这真是个谜啊

translation.en: Special delivery for Miss Willa Ward.
translation.zh: 薇拉沃德女士的特快专递

translation.en: Another talking animal?
translation.zh: 又一个会说话的动物？

translation.en: -How do you know who I am? -[tense music plays]
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我是谁？

translation.en: -Wow. -[soft music plays]
translation.zh: （威拉沃德）

translation.en: "Dear Willa Ward. We've just moved back in town after being away for some time."
translation.zh: “亲爱的薇拉沃德 我们离开了一段时间 刚刚搬回来

translation.en: "We knew your mother well,
translation.zh: 我们和你妈妈很熟

translation.en: and would love to tell you all about her and her magical necklace."
translation.zh: 非常愿意告诉你她的故事 以及她的奇妙项链

translation.en: "Please join us after school for tea and treats."
translation.zh: 请在放学后和我们一起喝茶吃点心

translation.en: "With love, Wanda and Wilma."
translation.zh: 怀着爱的旺达和威尔玛

translation.en: "P.S. We live in the old house at the top of the hill…"
translation.zh: 又及 我们住在山顶的那间老房子里”

translation.en: Oh, good morning, Kingsley Jenkins. Nice to see your face.
translation.zh: 早上好 金斯利詹金斯 很高兴看到你

translation.en: Oh! Good morning, Willa Ward. Welcome to class.
translation.zh: 早上好 薇拉沃德 欢迎来到教室 展开新一天的冒险

translation.en: -A new day of adventure. [gasps] -[Willa] Morning, Ms. Juniper.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到教室 展开新一天的冒险 早安 朱尼珀老师

translation.en: May I ask…
translation.zh: 我想问一下

translation.en: [softly] Where did you get that necklace?
translation.zh: 你的项链是哪儿来的？

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 怎么了吗？

translation.en: Oh, no reason exactly. [chuckling] Just curious.
translation.zh: 没怎么啦 只是好奇而已

translation.en: It was my mom's.
translation.zh: 这是我妈妈的

translation.en: Great! Good chat.
translation.zh: 太好了 真好

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Nice necklace!
translation.zh: 你这项链挺好看

translation.en: You getting ready for Halloween?
translation.zh: 你这是准备过万圣节了吗？

translation.en: Going as…
translation.zh: 你这是要扮成

translation.en: a fashion disaster?
translation.zh: 时尚灾难吗？

translation.en: [girl] Oh, wait.
translation.zh: 哦 等等

translation.en: I guess that wouldn't be a costume.
translation.zh: 你不用特别打扮就已经是了

translation.en: Since jealousy is actually a compliment, Blaine, I'm simply going to say thank you.
translation.zh: 既然嫉妒其实是一种夸赞 布莱恩 我就说一声谢谢

translation.en: I love it too!
translation.zh: 我也喜欢这个项链

translation.en: [Willa] Secret stair spot.
translation.zh: 秘密楼梯集合点

translation.en: Meeting at lunch. Super important.
translation.zh: 午饭时开会 有大事商量

translation.en: [sighs] Where is it?
translation.zh: 在哪里呢？

translation.en: [Willa] "Please join us after school for tea and treats."
translation.zh: “请在放学后和我们一起喝茶吃点心

translation.en: "With love, Wanda and Wilma."
translation.zh: 怀着爱的旺达和威尔玛”

translation.en: -What? -[Lucy] What?
translation.zh: -什么？ -什么？

translation.en: I know. What?
translation.zh: 就是啊 什么？

translation.en: Are you going?
translation.zh: 你要去吗？

translation.en: Of course she is. You're going, right?
translation.zh: 当然啦 你打算去 对吧？

translation.en: Of course I am. They said they know about my mom, and this necklace.
translation.zh: 当然了 她们说知道我妈妈的事 还有这条项链

translation.en: You're brave to go up there alone. You know, I would never go up there.
translation.zh: 你敢一个人去真勇敢 反正我肯定不敢去

translation.en: You do know the stories, right?
translation.zh: 你有听过那些故事吧？

translation.en: -That's why I'm not going alone. -Who are you going with?
translation.zh: 所以我才不会一个人去 那你要跟谁去？

translation.en: I'll pack some snacks. Nothing too sugary. The last 24 hours have been weird enough.
translation.zh: 我去装点零食 甜的东西就不拿了 过去的24小时已经够奇怪了

translation.en: Definitely.
translation.zh: 谁说不是呢

translation.en: Remember, I have to be home by dinner to babysit Sawyer.
translation.zh: 我得在晚饭前回家照顾索耶

translation.en: It shouldn't take too long. It's just tea, right?
translation.zh: 应该不会太久 就是喝个茶 对吧？

translation.en: Come on, let's do this.
translation.zh: 来吧 我们出发吧

translation.en: [boy] Do what?
translation.zh: 出发去干吗？

translation.en: -[Willa] Nothing. -Nobody.
translation.zh: -没什么 -没有人

translation.en: Hey, Wyatt.
translation.zh: 嘿 怀亚特

translation.en: You guys up to something exciting?
translation.zh: 你们要干什么刺激的事吗？

translation.en: No. [sighing] Totally boring.
translation.zh: 不 超无聊的

translation.en: Boring.
translation.zh: 无聊透顶

translation.en: Speak for yourself, Lucy. I'd call it intriguing.
translation.zh: 那是你觉得 露西 我觉得这很有趣

translation.en: -I mean-- -Be quiet.
translation.zh: 我是说 对 很无聊

translation.en: Yep. Boring. So boring.
translation.zh: 我是说 对 很无聊 超级无聊

translation.en: Ugh, bummer. I was looking for something fun to do after school today.
translation.zh: 真可惜 我本来想放学后找点乐子呢

translation.en: See ya.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: A talking crow is so not boring.
translation.zh: 会说话的乌鸦绝对不无聊

translation.en: Hey, Willa. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 嘿 薇拉 你怎么来了？

translation.en: Hey, Dad. Just wanted to let you know I'm going to be late today.
translation.zh: 嘿 爸爸 我今天要晚回家一个小时

translation.en: -I'm going to tea with, um, uh-- -Oh, okay, Willa. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我要去喝茶 和… 好的 薇拉

translation.en: Hey, little guy. I'll see you at dinner, right?
translation.zh: 嘿 小家伙！ 那晚餐时见 好吧？

translation.en: -[Willa] Okay, bye. -Don't worry, they're just eyeballs.
translation.zh: -好的 再见 -没关系 别担心 就是眼球形状的糖果而已

translation.en: Ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Why are we taking the spookiest possible route to get there?
translation.zh: 我们为什么要走这条最诡异的路线？

translation.en: You know, the legend says these woods are the Haunted Hills,
translation.zh: 传说中 这个树林叫做闹鬼山丘

translation.en: cursed by the three witches of Winding Way themselves.
translation.zh: 被蜿蜒路镇的三女巫亲自下了诅咒

translation.en: I heard that witches have lived in that old house for centuries.
translation.zh: 我听说有女巫 在那个老房子里住了几个世纪

translation.en: Well, it's a good thing we're brave, right?
translation.zh: 幸好我们很勇敢 对吧？

translation.en: Come on. None of that is real.
translation.zh: 好了啦 那些故事都不是真的

translation.en: -Besides, this isn't that spooky. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 再说了 -这也没有那么恐怖嘛 -是啊

translation.en: [Willa] They're probably just old ladies
translation.zh: 她们可能就是碰巧住在

translation.en: who happen to live in a really creepy old house.
translation.zh: 阴森的老房子里的老太太

translation.en: Just that right there sounded like the setup for a spooky movie.
translation.zh: 这听着完全就像恐怖电影的设置

translation.en: [hesitant] Yeah. What could go wrong?
translation.zh: 是啊 这能有什么问题呢？

translation.en: Famous last words.
translation.zh: 一般说这话的人都出事了

translation.en: [Scout] Defs the beginning of a spooky movie.
translation.zh: 这绝对是恐怖电影的开始

translation.en: Well, no time like the present.
translation.zh: 好了 就是现在了

translation.en: -Hello? -[soft music plays]
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Is anyone home?
translation.zh: 有人在家吗？

translation.en: I hope you don't mind. I brought my friends.
translation.zh: 我希望你们不介意 我带了两个朋友来

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -Willa! So nice to see you again.
translation.zh: 薇拉 很高兴再次见到你

translation.en: Again?
translation.zh: 再次？

translation.en: We knew you when you were just a baby.
translation.zh: 你还是个宝宝时我们就认识你了

translation.en: Oh, such a cute baby, with the skin, and the teeth, and the hairs, and things.
translation.zh: 多可爱的宝宝啊 你的皮肤以及 牙齿 以及头发什么的

translation.en: [Wilma] And Lucy, Scout.
translation.zh: 还有露西 丝考特

translation.en: -Welcome. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 欢迎光临

translation.en: How did you know…?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道…

translation.en: Oh, just a simple seeing spell, nothing fancy.
translation.zh: 哦 就是个简单的识人魔咒 没什么的

translation.en: -Spell? -Ix-nay on the agic-may.
translation.zh: -魔咒？ -你不要扯魔法的事

translation.en: Please, sit down.
translation.zh: 好了 请坐吧

translation.en: So, you knew my mom?
translation.zh: 所以 你们认识我妈妈？

translation.en: Oh! Knew her? [laughs]
translation.zh: 认识？

translation.en: Knew her? [laughs]
translation.zh: 岂止认识？

translation.en: She was, uh, we were like…
translation.zh: 她… 我们亲得不得了

translation.en: That. We were best friends. We were just real close.
translation.zh: 我们是最好的朋友 我们很要好

translation.en: -You couldn't keep the three of us apart. -[Wanda laughs]
translation.zh: 我们三个可是形影不离

translation.en: Well, until Neil-- [shrieks, laughs]
translation.zh: 哎呀 可惜尼尔…

translation.en: Until nothing. Until nothing. [strained laughter]
translation.zh: 没有什么啦

translation.en: She was a real sweetheart, you know, heart of gold.
translation.zh: 她人可好了 特别纯美善良

translation.en: [laughs] Don't be shy.
translation.zh: 别害羞嘛

translation.en: [chuckling] Well, this isn't much of a tea party, is it?
translation.zh: 哎呀 这可算不上什么茶会 对吧？

translation.en: [laughs] Kidding. No, because there are no treats, and, um, no tea.
translation.zh: 开玩笑的 因为这里既没点心也没茶

translation.en: But I can change that, so I'm going to. Alright? [laughs]
translation.zh: 但我能改变这一点 我这就来 好吧？

translation.en: -[gasping] -Amazing.
translation.zh: 好厉害

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: [strained] You know that children love candy, so just play along.
translation.zh: 你知道孩子们喜欢糖果的 你就配合一下吧

translation.en: -What's happening? -Now what is happening? [laughs]
translation.zh: -怎么回事？ -怎么回事？

translation.en: -[Wanda chuckles] -Isn't this fun?
translation.zh: 这很好玩吧？

translation.en: So much-- [gags]
translation.zh: 太好…

translation.en: So much fun. [laughs]
translation.zh: 太好玩了

translation.en: Now Scout: what is your favorite treat in the whole wide world?
translation.zh: 丝考特 世上你最喜欢吃的是什么？

translation.en: Cotton candy.
translation.zh: 棉花糖！

translation.en: Cotton candy. [gags]
translation.zh: 棉花糖

translation.en: Yum.
translation.zh: 真美味

translation.en: Edible chair? What? This might be the best day of my life.
translation.zh: 可以吃的椅子？天啊！ 这可能是我人生中最美好的一天

translation.en: Lucy, what would you like to have at tea for three?
translation.zh: 露西 在这三人茶会上 你想来点什么？

translation.en: Well, I've always dreamed of it raining chocolate.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 我一直梦想着下巧克力雨

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Wanda] Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不要啊

translation.en: -[Willa] Delicious! -[Lucy] Whoa!
translation.zh: 真美味！

translation.en: Now Willa, what about you, my dear?
translation.zh: 那么薇拉 你呢 亲爱的？

translation.en: I want to know about my mom,
translation.zh: 我想知道我妈妈的事

translation.en: so maybe we could have more talk, less treats.
translation.zh: 所以 也许我们可以多说点话 少吃点东西

translation.en: -Willa, are you crazy? -Speak for yourself.
translation.zh: -薇拉 你是疯了吗？ -就你这么觉得！

translation.en: She's here. What are we waiting for?
translation.zh: 她都来了 我们还在等什么呢？

translation.en: Let's get that thing off her.
translation.zh: 我们快把项链从她身上拿下来

translation.en: Well, um, you know, maybe we should just give them a moment to enjoy the tea party,
translation.zh: 也许我们应该 给她们一点时间享受一下茶会

translation.en: for-for a moment.
translation.zh: 就一下下

translation.en: Fink, Sneak, shut up!
translation.zh: 芬克 斯匿克 闭嘴！

translation.en: Wait a second. That's that rat from last night.
translation.zh: 等一下 那是昨天晚上的那只老鼠！

translation.en: [gasps] Uh, I think we should go.
translation.zh: 我想我们该走了

translation.en: -No. -[ominous music plays]
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [laughs] Let's cut to the chase, shall we?
translation.zh: 我们就直入主题吧 好吗？

translation.en: We want your necklace.
translation.zh: 我们要你的项链

translation.en: I know it would be nice for you to have it, but what good is it to you, really?
translation.zh: 我知道你戴着挺好的 可你拿它有什么用呢？

translation.en: I mean, whereas to us, getting it back would be,
translation.zh: 而对我们来说 把它拿回来会…

translation.en: I don't know, Wilma, what would you say?
translation.zh: 怎么说呢 威尔玛？

translation.en: Like, um, magnificently splendorifically terrifical?
translation.zh: 就是美妙绝伦、精彩奇妙又奇幻？

translation.en: -Yes, I'd say exactly that. -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 是的 和我想的一模一样

translation.en: No. It was my mom's and she wanted me to have it.
translation.zh: 不行！ 这是我妈妈的 她想让我来保管

translation.en: You invited me here to tell me about her, and I haven't heard one thing.
translation.zh: 你们说要跟我讲她的事 可我一样也没听到

translation.en: So, we're leaving.
translation.zh: 所以 我们要走了

translation.en: Uh, no you're not.
translation.zh: 不 你们休想走

translation.en: Sneak.
translation.zh: 斯匿克

translation.en: Aw, that's a shame, because there was an easy way to do this,
translation.zh: 真可惜啊 本来这件事可以简单解决

translation.en: and now, [laughs] what do you know, there's a hard way.
translation.zh: 可现在没办法 我们只好来硬的了

translation.en: I mean, we didn't want to have to play the witch card,
translation.zh: 我们本来不想打女巫牌

translation.en: but you've kind of forced our hands.
translation.zh: 可你们非要逼得我们出绝招

translation.en: -[cackling] -Witches! [screams]
translation.zh: 是女巫！

translation.en: See? I told you those stories are true.
translation.zh: 你看 我就说那些故事是真的！

translation.en: You want to know something about your mom?
translation.zh: 你想知道你妈妈的事吗？

translation.en: She was too trusting.
translation.zh: 她太容易相信别人了

translation.en: Just. Like. You.
translation.zh: 就 像 你一样

translation.en: -Over here! -[screaming]
translation.zh: 这边！

translation.en: -Oh, no. Um, here. Hide. -[Wanda] It's time! Witches coming for ya!
translation.zh: -糟糕了 -站住！ 这里 躲起来！ 女巫来抓你们了！

translation.en: [Wilma, singsongy] We just want to talk to you.
translation.zh: 我们只是想和你们谈谈

translation.en: [whimpers] They're coming.
translation.zh: 她们来了！

translation.en: [Willa] Hide. In here.
translation.zh: 快躲起来 这里！

translation.en: -[ominous music plays] -[singsongy] Girls! Where did you go?
translation.zh: 姑娘们 你们去哪里了？

translation.en: -[cackling] -You can run, but you can't hide.
translation.zh: 你们跑得掉 但是躲不掉！

translation.en: This way.
translation.zh: 这边

translation.en: Some kind of potion room.
translation.zh: 这好像是装魔药的房间

translation.en: I'm calling my mom. I don't care if I get grounded--
translation.zh: 我要打给我妈妈！哪怕我被禁足

translation.en: Forever. There's no signal.
translation.zh: 永远禁足 没有信号

translation.en: Lucy, your face feels more bony than usual.
translation.zh: 露西 你的脸比平时更有骨感了

translation.en: -You're not touching my face, Scout. -Sure I am.
translation.zh: 你没有在碰我的脸 丝考特 我明明就在啊

translation.en: That's your cheek, and now I'm sticking my finger into your eye--
translation.zh: 这是你的脸颊 现在我的手指戳进了你的眼睛

translation.en: [Scout] Into your eye?!
translation.zh: 戳进了你的眼睛？

translation.en: -[Wilma] Oh, girls? -[gasps] Oh no.
translation.zh: 哦 姑娘们？

translation.en: [screams] Find a potion!
translation.zh: 快找个魔药！

translation.en: -Do something! -[wails]
translation.zh: 想想办法呀！

translation.en: Nope. Upside down potion.
translation.zh: 不 “颠倒魔药”

translation.en: Flying potion.
translation.zh: “飞行魔药”

translation.en: Hiding potion! Aha!
translation.zh: “躲藏魔药”！

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 来

translation.en: "When ye wish to hide From the troubles on the outside
translation.zh: “如果你想躲掉外面的麻烦

translation.en: Drink this potion with open mind And ye shall be the… feline kind?"
translation.zh: 就用开放的心态喝下魔药 然后你就会变成猫”？

translation.en: Wait. Does that mean…?
translation.zh: 等等 难道说…

translation.en: -[tinkling] -Oh no.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: -You're-- -I have paws.
translation.zh: -你… -我有爪子！

translation.en: Oh, no. Oh, no. Oh, no.
translation.zh: 哦 糟了

translation.en: And a tail!
translation.zh: 还有尾巴！

translation.en: [Wilma] Yoo-hoo! Girls.
translation.zh: 嘿 姑娘们！

translation.en: Run!
translation.zh: 快跑！

translation.en: Run? I have to learn to walk with four legs before I can run!
translation.zh: 跑？我得先学会怎么用四条腿走路

translation.en: [Wanda] I won't let them get away.
translation.zh: 我不会让她们逃跑的

translation.en: -[Wanda] Where did they get to now? -[Wilma] Sure are slimy little things.
translation.zh: 她们在哪里？ 她们真是狡猾难缠的小东西

translation.en: -[Willa] Quick. Under here. -[dramatic music plays]
translation.zh: 快 到这下面来

translation.en: I've looked everywhere. They're gone.
translation.zh: 我到处都找过了 她们不见了

translation.en: And I looked everywhere you looked right after you did,
translation.zh: 你找过的地方我也跟着找了一遍

translation.en: just to be sure.
translation.zh: 以防有疏漏

translation.en: You know how cats can fit into the smallest places?
translation.zh: 你知道猫可以钻进很窄的空间吧？

translation.en: You want us to go in there? Look at the size of that spider.
translation.zh: 你要我们钻进去吗？ 那儿有那么大的蜘蛛呢！

translation.en: [scoffs] I'll stay here and meet my fate, thank you very much.
translation.zh: 那儿有那么大的蜘蛛呢！ 我就待在这里听天由命了 谢谢

translation.en: [Willa] Shoo, you big, hairy spider.
translation.zh: 走开 你这个毛毛的大蜘蛛

translation.en: We're coming in.
translation.zh: 我们进去吧

translation.en: [Scout] Come on, Lucy. We don't have time to be scared.
translation.zh: 来吧 露西 我们没时间害怕

translation.en: [witches scream] Where are they?
translation.zh: 她们在哪里？

translation.en: [gasps] A tail.
translation.zh: -尾巴 -尾巴

translation.en: A tail. [gasps] That means they've gotten into the hiding potion.
translation.zh: -尾巴 -尾巴 那说明她们喝了躲藏魔药

translation.en: -[gasps] -We need to go outside! We need Claw!
translation.zh: 我们得出去 我们需要克劳

translation.en: -Claw! -Claw!
translation.zh: -克劳！ -克劳！

translation.en: [Willa] We have to keep moving. We cannot be scaredy cats.
translation.zh: 我们得一直往前走 我们不能当胆小猫

translation.en: I am a scaredy cat, though.
translation.zh: 可我就是一只胆小猫

translation.en: Claw!
translation.zh: 克劳！

translation.en: -Oh, hey! How's the party going? -They snuck out in the drain.
translation.zh: 嘿！茶会进展得怎样了？ 她们躲进了下水道

translation.en: Let us know immediately if you see them, okay?
translation.zh: 如果你看到她们 马上告诉我们

translation.en: -Uh… sure? -Do not let them get away.
translation.zh: -绝对不要让她们逃走 -好的

translation.en: As the crow flies, they can't have gone far.
translation.zh: 按直线距离算 她们应该走不远

translation.en: You're a crow, so you should know. Okay, stop looking at me.
translation.zh: 你是乌鸦 所以你应该清楚 好了 别再看着我了

translation.en: -[caws] -Fly!
translation.zh: 飞吧！

translation.en: -Yes. Wilma? -Yes?
translation.zh: -威尔玛？ -什么事？

translation.en: Warm up the cauldron.
translation.zh: 把大锅烧热了

translation.en: Now?
translation.zh: 现在？

translation.en: Yes, Wilma, now.
translation.zh: 是的 威尔玛 现在

translation.en: Cat respect meter just went way up.
translation.zh: 我突然对猫咪肃然起敬

translation.en: That was so claustrophobic.
translation.zh: 我刚才都快得幽闭恐惧症了

translation.en: And filthy. Ew.
translation.zh: 而且那里面脏死了

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -Here, kitties, kitties, kitties!
translation.zh: 来呀 小猫咪！

translation.en: Well, I spy with my little crow eye… [caws]
translation.zh: 我的小乌鸦眼睛看到了…

translation.en: It's that creepy crow!
translation.zh: 是那只诡异的乌鸦！

translation.en: Shoo! Go away! Leave us alone!
translation.zh: 快走开！离我们远点！

translation.en: [caws] Not until you hand over the amulet.
translation.zh: 除非你交出护身符

translation.en: Run!
translation.zh: 快跑！

translation.en: -[bubbling] -[Wanda] Yes, yes, yes…
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Oh yes, oh yes!
translation.zh: 太好了 这就对了！

translation.en: Claw's got them. Wilma! Claw's got them!
translation.zh: 克劳抓到她们了 威尔玛！ 克劳抓到她们了

translation.en: We got 'em!
translation.zh: 抓到她们了！

translation.en: Fog and bog and city smog And nice little families out for a jog
translation.zh: 雾、沼泽和城市的尘霾 在外慢跑的可爱小家庭

translation.en: Envelop the children who are now cats And, oh, they'll be scared like, like rats
translation.zh: 快包围那变成猫的孩子们吧 她们会吓得像一只老鼠 好吧？

translation.en: [high-pitched] Meow! It's foggy, I can't see.
translation.zh: “雾蒙蒙的 我看不见”

translation.en: [normal voice] It's really working, Wilma, it's working!
translation.zh: 我的魔咒起效了 威尔玛 起效了

translation.en: [Willa] What is this place?
translation.zh: 这是什么地方？

translation.en: Super creepy, that's what.
translation.zh: 超诡异的 就是说啊

translation.en: In case we don't make it back, I just want to say
translation.zh: 万一我们回不去了 我只想说

translation.en: that I was 100% right about the witches this whole time.
translation.zh: 我百分之百预测对了她们是女巫！

translation.en: Where's all this fog coming from?
translation.zh: 这些雾是从哪里来的？

translation.en: I can't see my paws in front of my face!
translation.zh: 我都看不见我迈出的前爪

translation.en: This is so not fun anymore.
translation.zh: 这可一点都不好玩了！

translation.en: Honestly, it really hasn't been fun since the candy part,
translation.zh: 老实说 打从糖果那部分开始就不好玩了

translation.en: and even that felt a tad unsanitary.
translation.zh: 就连那个我也觉得有点不卫生

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -Hello, girls.
translation.zh: 你们好 姑娘们

translation.en: Nice work, Claw.
translation.zh: 干得好 克劳

translation.en: An extra portion of kitten stew just for you!
translation.zh: 我会专门为你多加一份猫咪炖汤

translation.en: Aha! Hello, kitten stew. [caws]
translation.zh: 太好了 猫咪炖汤

translation.en: One thing you three might have overlooked.
translation.zh: 你们三个可能忽略了一件事

translation.en: [Wilma] Witches love eating cat stew!
translation.zh: 女巫喜欢吃猫咪炖汤

translation.en: Especially on a stormy night.
translation.zh: 尤其是在风雨交加的夜晚

translation.en: Eat someone else then, because we're out of here.
translation.zh: 你们去吃别人吧 我们得走了

translation.en: -[Willa] Run! -[Lucy] I am not a snack.
translation.zh: -快跑！ -我不是拿来吃的！

translation.en: [groans] I forgot how slippery cats are.
translation.zh: 我忘了猫有多么滑溜溜

translation.en: But not how tasty.
translation.zh: 但美味忘不了

translation.en: -[Wilma] Whoo! -[Wanda] You go that way.
translation.zh: 你往那边走！

translation.en: -[Wilma exhales, clicks tongue] -Oh, no. Oh, no. Oh, no.
translation.zh: 哦 糟了

translation.en: [sighs] Where could they be?
translation.zh: 她们会在哪里呢？

translation.en: Don't move a whisker.
translation.zh: 一根胡须都不要动

translation.en: Oh, no, guys. I have to…
translation.zh: 不行 各位 我忍不住要…

translation.en: -Please don't sneeze. -[Lucy makes pre-sneeze noises]
translation.zh: 露西 求你别打喷嚏

translation.en: -[pre-sneeze noises] -[Willa] Please, please hold it in.
translation.zh: 拜托 忍住别打

translation.en: [Willa] Hold it in.
translation.zh: 忍住别打

translation.en: -Bless you. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -保佑你 -谢谢

translation.en: -We need to get out of here. -Now's our chance.
translation.zh: 我们得离开这里 就趁现在

translation.en: Lucy, wait!
translation.zh: 露西 等等！

translation.en: [cackles] Boo.
translation.zh: 吓你

translation.en: Not so fast this time.
translation.zh: 这次你们可跑不掉了

translation.en: Now the hiding's said and done Return the form that they came from
translation.zh: 她们的躲藏已完毕 现在让她们现原形！

translation.en: We're human again. We're human!
translation.zh: 我们又变成人类了！ 我们是人类！

translation.en: -Hey, hi. -Yes! Still dangerous witches, not so happy.
translation.zh: 喂 危险的女巫还在这儿呢 别这么开心

translation.en: Looks like you girls have been rooted out.
translation.zh: 看来你们总算被揪出来了

translation.en: And it's going to be a lot harder for you to escape
translation.zh: 现在你们可没那么容易逃脱了

translation.en: now that you're just "pesky little girls" and not cats.
translation.zh: 你们现在只是“讨厌的小女孩” 而不是猫了

translation.en: Oh, I have an idea. Why don't we call this whole thing off,
translation.zh: 我有个主意 不如我们少废话

translation.en: and you just, I don't know, hand over the necklace.
translation.zh: 你们就 那什么 把项链交出来吧

translation.en: Just grab it.
translation.zh: 你直接上手啊！

translation.en: You know as well as I do, it needs to be given, not taken.
translation.zh: 你和我一样清楚 这东西只能被给予 不能强抢

translation.en: Well, in that case, hand over the amulet. Now!
translation.zh: 那样的话 把护身符交出来 就现在！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: My mom would never want it in the hands of you bad witches.
translation.zh: 我妈妈绝不会 让你们这些坏女巫拿到它

translation.en: -I'm gonna get my dad and he'll-- -[laughing]
translation.zh: 我这就去找我爸爸 他会…

translation.en: Did you hear that, Wilma? She's going to get "Neil" to come help.
translation.zh: 你听到了吗 威尔玛？ 她打算叫尼尔来帮忙

translation.en: -[Wanda] Neil! -[laughing]
translation.zh: 尼尔！

translation.en: My mom was right. Chocolate alleviates stress.
translation.zh: 我妈妈说得对 巧克力可以减轻压力

translation.en: Good thing I loaded up at the tea party.
translation.zh: 还好我在茶会上拿了好多

translation.en: Seriously? You're eating candy right now?
translation.zh: 你有没有搞错？你现在还在吃糖果？

translation.en: Candy? [gags]
translation.zh: 糖果？

translation.en: The candy!
translation.zh: 糖果！

translation.en: They can't stand candy. Literally!
translation.zh: 她们受不了糖果！

translation.en: Take that!
translation.zh: 接招吧！

translation.en: Let's get out of here, fast.
translation.zh: 我们快点离开这里吧

translation.en: -Ooh! Oh no. Burning! -[Wilma whimpers, yelps]
translation.zh: 哦 不好 烧到我了！

translation.en: -[screams] Stop! -[dramatic music plays]
translation.zh: 站住！

translation.en: We made it.
translation.zh: 我们逃脱了

translation.en: -[Scout] Oh my goodness. -Hey! Alright, I got a signal!
translation.zh: 天啊 嘿！ 好了 我有信号了

translation.en: Oh, good.
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: Okay, I am so grounded.
translation.zh: 我肯定会被禁足的

translation.en: So much for those stories being made up, huh, Scout?
translation.zh: 你这下不会说 那些故事是编的了吧 丝考特？

translation.en: I mean, no 11-year-old really believes in witches.
translation.zh: 不是我说 没哪个11岁的孩子真的相信女巫

translation.en: How was I supposed to know?
translation.zh: 我怎么会知道？

translation.en: I have a feeling that's not the last we'll be seeing of those two. [sighs]
translation.zh: 我感觉这不会是 我们最后一次见到她们

translation.en: As scary as tonight was, it was also pretty cool to be a cat.
translation.zh: 虽然今晚很可怕 但当一只猫还挺酷的

translation.en: -[soft music plays] -Think we can do it again? [in unison] Seriously?
translation.zh: -你觉得我们可以再来一次吗？ -你没搞错吧？

translation.en: -Too soon? -[in unison] Yes!
translation.zh: 得先缓一缓？ 是的！

translation.en: And there's no way I'm going back into that house to get more potion. Except…
translation.zh: 我也绝不会回到那里去拿更多的魔药 除非

translation.en: Wait a second. I forgot to put it back on the shelf.
translation.zh: 等一下 我忘记把它放回架子上了

translation.en: I think seventh grade just got a lot more interesting.
translation.zh: 我感觉七年级突然变得有趣得多了

translation.en: Hey, guys? Thanks for being such great friends today and sticking by me.
translation.zh: 对了 谢谢你们这么有义气地帮助我

translation.en: You guys are like the sisters I never had. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们不是亲姐妹 但胜似亲姐妹

translation.en: [in a spooky voice] The Sisters of Winding Way! Whoo…
translation.zh: 蜿蜒路镇姐妹团！

translation.en: -[laughing] -Wisters!
translation.zh: 女巫姐妹团！

translation.en: The Wisters of Winding Way! [laughing]
translation.zh: 蜿蜒路镇女巫姐妹团！

translation.en: -The Wisters! -[Willa] Come on.
translation.zh: 女巫姐妹团！ 来吧

translation.en: Heyo.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: What would you say if I told you I got chased by witches today
translation.zh: 如果我告诉你我今天被女巫追

translation.en: and turned into a cat?
translation.zh: 还变成了猫 你会说什么？

translation.en: [inhales] Well I would say, sweetheart,
translation.zh: 我会说 亲爱的

translation.en: you don't have to make up stories to get my attention.
translation.zh: 你不必编故事来吸引我的注意

translation.en: You always have my attention.
translation.zh: 我的注意力一直在你身上呢

translation.en: Thought it would be something like that.
translation.zh: 我就知道会是这样

translation.en: -[soft music plays] -Do you know where Mom got this?
translation.zh: 你知道妈妈的项链是怎么来的吗？

translation.en: No. She just always had it, ever since I knew her.
translation.zh: 不 我认识她时她就一直戴着它

translation.en: She used to say she was a different person before she and I met and we had you.
translation.zh: 她总说她认识我和生下你之前 她是个完全不同的人

translation.en: Maybe she got it from one of the [spooky voice] witches of Winding Way.
translation.zh: 也许那是她 从蜿蜒路镇的某个女巫那里得到的

translation.en: Bedtime.
translation.zh: 该睡觉了

translation.en: You want the lights on or off?
translation.zh: 你想开着灯还是关掉？

translation.en: On.
translation.zh: 开着吧

translation.en: Okay. Love you, kiddo.
translation.zh: 好 爱你 乖乖

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: "Dear Willa."
translation.zh: “亲爱的薇拉 如果你在读这个

translation.en: "If you're reading this, that means you have my necklace,
translation.zh: “亲爱的薇拉 如果你在读这个 就说明你拿到了我的项链

translation.en: and I think you're probably wondering if I was a witch."
translation.zh: 我想你可能在想我是不是个女巫

translation.en: "I was."
translation.zh: 是的”

translation.en: [Willow] I was a witch, Willa.
translation.zh: 我是个女巫 薇拉

translation.en: [sighs] And if I know my curious…
translation.zh: 我知道你是个有好奇心

translation.en: pure-hearted, beautiful baby girl…
translation.zh: 心地纯净又美丽的宝贝女儿

translation.en: …I know what you're thinking. [exhales]
translation.zh: 所以我知道你在想什么

translation.en: "How could my mom be a witch, and does this make me a witch too?"
translation.zh: “我妈妈怎么可能是女巫？ 那我也是个女巫吗？”

translation.en: Just because you are mine…
translation.zh: 单单因为你是我的女儿

translation.en: "…doesn't make you a witch."
translation.zh: “并不意味着你就是女巫了

translation.en: "Believing in magic does, and you can be a witch."
translation.zh: 关键是你要相信魔法 那你就能成为女巫”

translation.en: A good witch,
translation.zh: 一个好女巫

translation.en: if you choose to believe in the values of courage,
translation.zh: 如果你选择相信好的价值观 勇气

translation.en: kindness, and wisdom.
translation.zh: 善良 还有智慧

translation.en: "Magic can be used for bad things,
translation.zh: “魔法可以用来做坏事

translation.en: but it can also be used for very, very good things."
translation.zh: 但也可以用来做非常好的事情”

translation.en: You taught me that, Willa.
translation.zh: 这是你教给我的 薇拉

translation.en: And now that you have my necklace, you have that choice.
translation.zh: 现在你有了我的项链 你就有了向善的选择

translation.en: There is something very important you must do, though.
translation.zh: 但你有一件很重要的事要做

translation.en: "In order to harness the power of the amulet,
translation.zh: “为了获得护身符的法力

translation.en: and keep yourself safe…"
translation.zh: 并保护你自己的安全”

translation.en: …you will need my secret witch book.
translation.zh: 你需要我的秘密女巫书

translation.en: I hid it for you in case this day ever came.
translation.zh: 我把它藏了起来 以备这一天的到来

translation.en: There will be obstacles along the way to finding it…
translation.zh: 你在寻找它的过程中会遇到阻碍

translation.en: "…to make sure it ends up in the right hands."
translation.zh: “以确保它会落入对的人的手中”

translation.en: Your hands. [sighs]
translation.zh: 你的手中

translation.en: I love you…
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: with all that I am.
translation.zh: 全身心地爱你

translation.en: "And I am always with you."
translation.zh: “我一直和你在一起”

translation.en: Closer than you know.
translation.zh: 比你想象中还要靠近

translation.en: [crying] "Take good care of Dad."
translation.zh: “好好照顾爸爸”

translation.en: [voice breaking] You are my heart.
translation.zh: 你是我的心

translation.en: "Mom."
translation.zh: “妈妈留”
